# availableMetadataObjectTypes

**Instance Property**

An array of strings identifying the types of metadata objects that can be captured.

## Declaration

```swift
var availableMetadataObjectTypes: [AVMetadataObject.ObjectType] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each string in the array corresponds to a possible value in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataObject/type] property of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataObject] objects reported by the receiver. The available types are dependent on the capabilities of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureInput/Port] to which the receiver’s connection is attached.

## Configuring metadata capture

- **metadataObjectTypes**: An array of strings identifying the types of metadata objects  to process.
- **rectOfInterest**: A rectangle of interest for limiting the search area for visual metadata.
- **requiredMetadataObjectTypesForCinematicVideoCapture**: The required metadata object types when Cinematic Video capture is enabled.
